title: Ep 159: Cooking = Love with Julia Turshen
itunes:title: Ep 159: Cooking = Love with Julia Turshen
itunes:subtitle: Kate lets work stress get the better of her hard-earned routines and Doree volunteers as an act of self-care. Then, Julia Turshen takes a break from her cooking to chat with Kate and Doree about how cooking and reality tv play a role in her self-care, ...
description:
Kate lets work stress get the better of her hard-earned routines and Doree volunteers as an act of self-care. Then, Julia Turshen takes a break from her cooking to chat with Kate and Doree about how cooking and reality tv play a role in her self-care, what The Matrix has to do with diet culture, and why food justice can mean something different from one person to another. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
